Description: Airtame Hub with 3-year core License – Screen Sharing & Digital Signage Functionality Share any window or whole screen content from your browser / Airplay / Google Cast / Miracast without installing any application on PC / Laptop along with Digital Signage functions. Additional PoE+ Power Supply required
Airtame Core - Credit for renewal of 1 License for 1 year

Airtame Hub Conferencing with 1-year Hybrid License – Conferencing, Screen Sharing & USB Functionality Airtame Hybrid allows you to Effortlessly control your video conferencing with a single conferencing system. Easy screen sharing for all participants in a room, and remote attendees & also Screen share in a meeting without joining the video conference call. Additional PoE+ Power Supply required.
Airtame Hybrid - Credit for renewal of 1 License for 1 year
